PVoid

Copy

public static void Copy( PUInt64 dst, int p0, ulong[] src, int p1, int len );
Copies a C# uint64 array into a PUInt64 class.
Parameters:
dst - The destination allocated memory.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The source uint64 array.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (uint64) elements to copy.

Copy

public static void Copy( ulong[] dst, int p0, PUInt64 src, int p1, int len );
Copies a PUInt64 into a C# array.
Parameters:
dst - The destination C# array.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The allocated memory array to copy from.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (uint64) elements to copy.

SizeOfType

public override int SizeOfType();
Returns sizeof(ulong), 8 bytes as per MS specification, this is the 'atomic' element size.
See Also:
PVoid

ulong*

public static implicit operator ulong*( PUInt64 p );
Casts a PUInt64 to an unsafe pointer to uint64 (uint64*)
Parameters:
p - The PUInt64 to cast to uint64
